Recording Recording… Tap stop when finished to save the record file %1$s kHz, %2$s, encoding “%3$s” into “AMR-NB” Mono Stereo Invalid number of channels Invalid
TRANSCRIPTION
Transcription It is simple.\n If audio/video file is not corrupted, decoding and transcription will start automatically.\n After conversion completes, it will offer to save the resulted MIDI-file.\n Then, you can go back to the main screen and MIDI will start playing automatically.
YouTube Downloaded from YouTube:\n%1$s
FFmpeg Could not understand what kind of media file it is
Duration %1$d min : %2$d sec\nFormat %3$s\n\nMeta data:\n%4$s\n\nStreams:\n%5$s Cancel Cancelled by user Successfully decoded media file Could not decode media file, probably because its format is not supported
Output from FFmpeg: File IO operation interrupted:\n\n%1$s
&memory;Could not read media file:\n\n%1$s &memory;Could not decode media file:\n\n%1$s &memory;Could not draw audio wave graph:\n\n%1$s
Audio wave for the 1st second Log mel-scaled spectrogram
YOUTUBE SURF
This might be not a valid YouTube URL:\n%1$s Could not load the requested YouTube web page:\n%1$s Video not found, probably you did not click on the video itself Could not get download link Streaming data is unplayable, probably because copyright protection is enabled Could not find audio stream Google returns not valid json if api limit
&permissions;Storage (Files and media)
Toasts
Trying to download… Download started. \nYou can check status in the notification area.
Download failed Some possibly transient error occurred
No external storage device was found, the SD card is not mounted &exists; Storage issue Error receiving or processing data occurred at the HTTP level &memory; There were too many redirects Cannot handle received HTTP code
Download paused Exceeded size limit for downloads over the mobile network, waiting for a Wi-Fi connection to proceed Waiting for network connectivity to proceed Network error occurred, waiting before retrying the request Unknown reason
Download is waiting to start Download is currently running Download successfully completed Unknown status
Menu Close Back Forward Download
USER GUIDE
Share Google Play App link with other people
Open any MIDI- or Karaoke-file or any other audio-file (such as MP3, WAV, etc.) The program will automatically transcribe audio and save as a MIDI-file However, no instrument information is extracted, and all transcribed notes get combined into one part The accuracy depends on the complexity of the song, and is obviously higher for solo piano pieces. Accuracy for piano pieces is around 75%. Select tracks. Percussion-tracks (like “Drums”, “Rhythms”, “Hit”, “Blow”, “Strike”, “Clash”, etc.) will be disabled. If you want to go forward or backwards chord-by-chord, you can use scroll-bar left or right button Or if you want just to play the song in real time, press “Play” button
